mapper.insert: INSERT INTO corona_international (createDt, natDeathCnt, natDefCnt, nationNm, areaNm) VALUES(#{createDt}, #{natDeathCnt}, #{natDefCnt}, #{nationNm}, #{areaNm});
mapper.select: select * from corona_international where areaNm = #{continent} and date_format(createDt ,"%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date},"%Y-%m-%d") group by nationNm ORDER BY natDefCnt desc
